entity.name: President Trump puts VP Pence in charge of US response to coronavirus
entity.description: Donald Trump said the risk to the US from the deadly coronavirus “remains very low” and that he has put Vice President Mike Pence in charge of the American response to the outbreak.

text: @realDonaldTrump President Trump’s laser focus with coronavirus is bullying media into falsely reporting Trump Regime is doing an amazing job and everything is under control. Trump would never report necessary public health advise if it made his Regime look bad. Super dangerous for US.
